dc_title_s: Map of land-grant and bond-aided railroads of the United States
dc_description_s: Map and text were intended for use as an official guide by the military in order to receive compensation for transportation of U.S. troops and property over land-grant and bond-aided railroads.; Accompanied by guide/text (61 pages ; 20 cm.). Text contains government regulations and tables of railroads.|66 x 94 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:4,200,000|General Map Collection
